hero.title: Temporary not permanent
hero.description: TempVoice keeps your Discord server organized by creating temporary voice channels that disappear as soon as they’re empty.

channels.title: What’s a Temporary Channel?
channels.description: A temporary voice channel is automatically created when someone joins a Creator Channel and it’s deleted once everyone leaves.

interface.title: Let your members moderate themselves!
interface.description: Temporary voice channels are controlled and moderated by the user who created them.

quote.title: Thank you for your interest in TempVoice!
quote.description: This app changes the way you use Discord! Since 2021, I’ve been working with the community’s feedback to make every Discord server way more efficient and enjoyable.

hero.title: How do I set up TempVoice?
hero.description: Using TempVoice couldn’t be easier. Invite the app to your Discord server and use the /setup command. TempVoice will create the basic channels needed to generate and manage temporary channels.

hero.title: Customize More with Premium
hero.description: Unlock the full potential of your Discord server with unrestricted access to all features. Cancel at any time.

features.title: More Customization. More Freedom.
features.description: Make TempVoice your own and enjoy the freedom to customize the bot exactly how you want, with no limits.

discount.title: Get 2 months for free
discount.description: Save 16% with a yearly billing cycle

activate.title: Activate Premium
activate.description: Activate premium on the server where you want to use TempVoice Premium.

token.title: Token

select.prompt: Enter a token to install or restart your bot

token.description: By entering a token, you agree to our Terms of Service. Never share this token with anyone else and treat it like a password.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Click on the preview to visit the Discord Developer Portal to change its name, icon, banner and 'About Me' section. Updating the status can take up to 5 minutes.

invite.title: Invite
invite.description: Your TempVoice is ready to be invited to your server. Make sure Premium is activated and the public bot is removed.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to 'Your Own Branding'
upgrade.description: When you upgrade your Premium plan, we will immediately charge the difference between your current plan and the new plan to the payment method you previously used. Your billing cycle won’t change. Starting with your next renewal, your subscription will continue at the regular price of the upgraded plan.
upgrade.confirmation: I authorize TempVoice to upgrade me.

language.title: TempVoice Language
language.description: Change the language of the Discord app

creator.title: Creator Channels
creator.description: Standard voice channels that create temporary voice channels when a user joins them.

create.title: Add a new Creator!
create.description: This will create a new channel in your Discord server, used to generate temporary channels.

delete.title: Delete this Creator?
delete.description: This will delete the channel from your Discord server and remove all its configurations. This action cannot be undone.

premium.title: Creator Limit Reached
premium.description: You need TempVoice Premium to set up unlimited Creator Channels.

preview.title: Interface Preview
preview.description: You can interact with the TempVoice Interface to customize it. Some features require Premium.

name.title: Webhook Name
name.description: Choose a clear and recognizable name, for example your Discord server name.

avatar.title: Webhook Avatar
avatar.description: Set an avatar image, such as your server’s icon or another fitting graphic.

title.title: Title
title.description: Provide a short and meaningful title, e.g. your server name.

description.title: Description
description.description: Write a description that explains the purpose and functionality of the TempVoice Interface.

attachment.title: Attachment
attachment.description: Insert the URL of an image to display as an attachment.

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: Add a footer that gives context or instructions related to the buttons.

color.title: Color
color.description: Specify a HEX color code to customize the embed’s accent color.

buttons.description: Click a button to disable it. Try dragging them to rearrange.

send.title: Send Interface
send.description: Send the customized TempVoice Interface to a text channel of your choice. We recommend a channel where no one else can write.

status.failed: Interface could not be sent. Please try again later.

voice_role.title: Temporary Voice Role

mode.everyone: Every user will get the 'Voice Role' when they join a temporary channel.
mode.owner: Only the owner of the temporary channel will get the 'Voice Role'.

voice_role.description: Assign a role to users when they are in a temporary voice channel.

recover_owner_settings.title: Recover Owner Settings
recover_owner_settings.description: Recovers a temporary channel with the same settings it had before being deleted, including name, permissions and user limit.

privacy_mode.title: Temporary Channel Privacy Mode
privacy_mode.description: Choose whether temporary channels are public, locked, or hidden from other users by default.

position.title: Temporary Channel Position
position.description: Set where the temporary channel will be created in relation to the Creator Channel the user joins.

permissions.title: Temporary Channel Permissions

description.problem: The permissions 'Connect', 'View Channel', and 'Send Messages' cannot be synced for @everyone, as they are reserved for handling channel locking and visibility.
description.solution: If you want to restrict @everyone from accessing temporary channels, please use the 'Temporary Channel Access Roles' instead.

permissions.description: Choose where to sync permissions from when creating a temporary channel.

owner_permissions.title: Temporary Channel Owner Permissions
owner_permissions.description: Grant owners of temporary channels extra permissions (e.g., Manage Channel, Move Members) while they are in control of the channel.

moderation_log.title: Moderation Log
moderation_log.description: Sends messages to a text channel using a Discord webhook URL to log temporary channel actions like creation, deletion and modification.

max_channels.title: Max Temporary Channels
max_channels.description: Limits the maximum number of temporary channels that can exist at the same time.

greeting.title: Temporary Channel Greeting

mode.silent: The message will be sent silently without any @ping
mode.ping: The message might trigger a @ping sound

greeting.description: Sends a message to the temporary voice channel’s text chat when it’s created, optionally including an TempVoice Interface.

features.title: Toggle Features

chat.title: In-Voice Chat
chat.description: The integrated text channel for a voice channel.

owner.title: Owner Managed On
owner.description: Temporary channels are manageable by the users who created them.

none.title: Owner Managed Off
none.description: Temporary channels cannot be managed by the users who created them.

features.description: Choose which features temporary channel owners are allowed to use while they are in control of the channel.

censor.title: Censor Channel Names
censor.description: Automatically censor inappropriate words in temporary channel names.

replacement.title: Replacement Symbol
replacement.description: Symbol used to replace the characters of a censored word (e.g., I #### this).

protection.title: Bypass Protection
protection.description: Replaces non-Latin characters that look like Latin letters (e.g., Cyrillic) with their real Latin equivalents.

bitrate.title: Temporary Channel Bitrate
bitrate.description: Choose the audio bitrate for temporary voice channels. Higher values improve quality but may be limited by your server’s boost level.

access_roles.title: Temporary Channel Access Roles

mode.locked: Users without an 'Access Role' can see but not join temporary channels.
mode.hidden: Users without an 'Access Role' cannot see temporary channels.

access_roles.description: Select roles that are required to see or access temporary channels, overriding the default @everyone permission.

name.title: Temporary Channel Name
name.description: Set the default naming format for temporary channels when they are created.

waiting.title: Waiting Room Name
waiting.description: Set the naming format used for Waiting Room channels.

limit.title: Temporary Channel User Limit
limit.description: Set the default user limit for temporary channels when they are created.

range.title: User Limit Range
range.description: Set the minimum and maximum user limit that the owner of a temporary channel can set.

category.title: Temporary Channel Category
category.description: Choose the category where temporary channels will be created.

fallbacks.title: Temporary Channel Category Fallbacks
fallbacks.description: Choose categories which will be used as a fallback when the primary category reaches the Discord limit of 50 channels.

owner.title: Owner
owner.OWNER_USERNAME: Username of the user who owns the channel
owner.OWNER_NICKNAME: Nickname of the user who owns the channel
owner.OWNER_CREATED: Date on which the user created their account (DD/MM/YYYY)
owner.OWNER_JOINED: Date on which the user joined the server (DD/MM/YYYY)

roles.title: Owner Role
roles.ROLE_HIGHEST: Name of the highest role the user has
roles.ROLE_HOIST: Name of the highest role shown in the member list

activity.title: Activity
activity.ACTIVITY_NAME: The title of the game the owner is playing
activity.ACTIVITY_NAME_MAJORITY: The title of the game the majority is playing

miscellaneous.title: Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.CUSTOM: Shows the custom channel name which the owner has chosen
miscellaneous.RANDOM: Shows a random word from a predefined list
miscellaneous.PRIVACY: Shows the privacy mode (public/locked/hidden) of the channel

custom.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner has not set a custom channel name yet. This placeholder can include other placeholders.

random.description: Set a list of words which will be used randomly. This placeholder can include other placeholders.

role.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner has no roles.

name.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner or the majority has no activity.

state.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner has no activity state.

emoji.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner has no activity emoji.

details.description: Choose a default text when the channel owner has no activity details.

unlocked.title: Public Channel
unlocked.description: Choose a text to show when the temporary channel is public.

locked.title: Locked Channel
locked.description: Choose a text to show when the temporary channel is locked.

hidden.title: Invisible Channel
hidden.description: Choose a text to show when the temporary channel is invisible.

prompt.description: Would you like to join our Discord?

cookie.description: This website only uses cookies that are essential for its functionality.
